com.flyingspaniel.nava.emit

Class EmitListenerList<A0>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flyingspaniel.nava.emit.EmitListenerList<A0>
  • Type Parameters:
    A0 - the class of the first argument sent to the listener
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Emit.IListenerList<A0>

    public class EmitListenerList<A0>
extends Object
implements Emit.IListenerList<A0>
    A semi-replacement for EventListenerList, inspired by node.js Emitters.
    This handles emitting events for one particular ID (e.g. "error") of listener.

    Uses a CopyOnWriteArrayList. Order of addition is preserved. You can generally NOT add a listener twice - see allowDuplicates

    Normally clients don't use this directly, they use Emitter which fires multiple event types

    Since:
    Copyright(c) 2013 Morgan Conrad
    Author:
    Morgan Conrad
    See Also:
    This software is released under the MIT License
